name: Design Critique Template
description:
Setting proper context before a critique can help make your design critique more effective and productive.


Use this design critique template to prep for your next critique session.


---


Intro - Make a human connection! :)


Context - Before showing your work, set up context around what you need feedback on and what specific problems are being solved by the design.


Feedback - Present the work you need feedback on and discuss. Reminder to accept feedback and move on, be kind and respectful, stay on time, and thank your Design Advisor.


Post-session: Create action items based on feedback and review your experience.


---
